entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
